attributes.action: Remove theresa may from power before she destroys Brexit
attributes.background:
17.4 million people voted to leave the EU  and the customs union 
No deals were ever mantioned when the referendum was announced 
Leave means leave

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions which call for people to lose their jobs. This includes government Ministers.

There are already petitions about leaving the EU, which you might like to sign. For example:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235185
